name: Brazilian Lemonade (With Limes and Condensed Milk)
description: Brazilian-style lemonade is made with fresh lime juice and sweetened with condensed milk. It's a richer, sweeter version of the lemonade we're used to, and excellent with a shot of Cachaça.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup juice from about 10 limes or 5 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lemon or lime juice, condensed milk, salt, and water in a blender. Blend until homogenous and frothy, about 30 seconds. Transfer to a pitcher. Add ice. Serve immediately.
